                      6.6 KDæ ‘

                      iEDAAbout 9 min

                      # ä¸€ã€å…³äºå¤šç»´æŸ¥è¯¢

                      # 1. ä¸€ç»´æŸ¥è¯¢

                      • å‡è®¾è¡¨æ ¼Tå‚¨å­˜äº†å­¦ç”Ÿçš„è€ƒè¯•æˆç»©ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ†æ•°49åˆ†ä»¥ä¸Šçš„å­¦ç”Ÿ?

                      • å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨éå†çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºäº†ã€‚

                      • ä¸ºäº†æé«˜æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚

                      å›¾1 å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘

                      # 2. äºŒç»´æŸ¥è¯¢
                      • å‡è®¾è¡¨æ ¼Tå‚¨å­˜äº†å­¦ç”Ÿçš„è¯­æ–‡å’Œæ•°å­¦è€ƒè¯•æˆç»©ï¼Œå¦‚æœæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­æ–‡æˆç»©ä»‹äº30ï½93ï¼Œæ•°å­¦æˆç»©ä»‹äº30ï½90çš„å­¦ç”Ÿï¼Ÿ

                      å›¾2 è¡¨æ ¼

                      • å¦‚æœç»§ç»­ä½¿ç”¨å¹³è¡¡äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåˆ™éœ€è¦é¦–å…ˆåˆ†åˆ«è·å¾—è¯­æ–‡æˆç»©å’Œæ•°å­¦æˆç»©çš„é›†åˆï¼Œå†ç®—å‡ºä¸¤ä¸ªé›†åˆçš„äº¤é™…ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºã€‚

                      • ä¸ºäº†æé«˜æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå°†æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¿æŒåœ¨æ°´å¹³ï¼š

                      1) æ ¹æ®è¯­æ–‡æˆç»©å°†æ‰€æœ‰äººçš„æˆç»©åˆ†æˆä¸¤åŠï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ä¸€åŠçš„è¯­æ–‡æˆç»©<=c1ï¼Œå¦ä¸€åŠçš„è¯­æ–‡æˆç»©>c1ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«å¾—åˆ°é›†åˆS1,S2;
                      2) é’ˆå¯¹S1ï¼Œæ ¹æ®æ•°å­¦æˆç»©åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤åŠï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ä¸€åŠçš„æ•°å­¦æˆç»©<=m1,å¦ä¸€åŠçš„æ•°å­¦æˆç»©>m1ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«å¾—åˆ°S3,S4;
                      3) é’ˆå¯¹S2ï¼Œæ ¹æ®æ•°å­¦æˆç»©åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤åŠï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ä¸€åŠçš„æ•°å­¦æˆç»©<=m2,å¦ä¸€åŠçš„æ•°å­¦æˆç»©>m2ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«å¾—åˆ°S5,S6ï¼›
                      4) æ ¹æ®è¯­æ–‡æˆç»©åˆ†åˆ«å¯¹S3,S4ï¼ŒS5,S6ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œç±»ä¼¼åˆ’åˆ†å¾—åˆ°æ›´å°çš„é›†åˆï¼Œç„¶åå†åœ¨æ›´å°çš„é›†åˆä¸Šæ ¹æ®æ•°å­¦æˆç»©ç»§ç»­

                      å›¾3 åˆ’åˆ†

                      • é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸Šæ“ä½œï¼Œå°±ç”Ÿæˆäº†ä¸€é¢—kdæ ‘:

                      å›¾4 ç”ŸæˆKDæ ‘

                      # äºŒã€å…³äºKDæ ‘

                      # 1. å…³äºKDæ ‘

                      • KDæ ‘(K-dimensional treeï¼Œkç»´æ ‘)ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç§é«˜ä½ç´¢å¼•æ ‘å½¢æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚

                      • KDæ ‘çš„æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æ˜¯kç»´ç‚¹çš„äºŒå‰æ ‘ã€‚

                      • æ‰€æœ‰éå¶èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½å¯ä»¥çœ‹æˆç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªè¶…å¹³é¢æŠŠç©ºé—´åˆ†åŒºæˆä¸¤ä¸ª åŠç©ºé—´ã€‚

                      • èŠ‚ç‚¹å·¦å­æ ‘ä»£è¡¨åœ¨è¶…å¹³é¢å·¦è¾¹çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œå³å­æ ‘ä»£è¡¨å³è¾¹çš„ç‚¹ã€‚

                      å›¾5 KDæ ‘

                      # 2. è¶…å¹³é¢çš„é€‰æ‹©æ–¹æ³•

                      • æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½ä¸kç»´ä¸­å‚ç›´äºè¶…å¹³é¢çš„é‚£ä¸€ç»´æœ‰å…³ã€‚

                      • å› æ­¤ï¼Œå¦‚æœé€‰æ‹©æŒ‰ç…§xè½´åˆ’åˆ†ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰xå€¼å°äºæŒ‡å®šå€¼çš„ç»“ç‚¹éƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°åœ¨å·¦å­æ ‘ï¼Œå¤§äºçš„éƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°åœ¨å³å­æ ‘ã€‚

                      • è¿™æ ·ï¼Œè¶…å¹³é¢å¯ä»¥ç”¨xå€¼æ¥åœˆå®šï¼Œå…¶æ³•çº¿ä¸ºxè½´çš„å•ä½å‘é‡ã€‚

                      å›¾6 è¶…å¹³é¢

                      ## ä¸‰ã€KDæ ‘çš„ç®—æ³•
                      # 1. æ„é€ 
                      • å¾ªç¯ä¾åºå–æ•°æ®ç‚¹çš„å„ç»´åº¦æ¥ä½œä¸ºåˆ‡åˆ†ç»´åº¦;
                      ç»´åº¦é€‰æ‹©æè¿°
                      åˆ‡åˆ†ç»´åº¦é€‰æ‹©ä¼˜åŒ–- æ„å»ºå¼€å§‹å‰ï¼Œå¯¹æ¯”æ•°æ®ç‚¹åœ¨å„ç»´åº¦çš„åˆ†å¸ƒæƒ…å†µï¼Œæ•°æ®ç‚¹åœ¨æŸä¸€ç»´åº¦åæ ‡å€¼çš„æ–¹å·®è¶Šå¤§åˆ†å¸ƒè¶Šåˆ†æ•£ï¼Œæ–¹å·®è¶Šå°åˆ†å¸ƒè¶Šé›†ä¸­ã€‚ - ä»æ–¹å·®å¤§çš„ç»´åº¦å¼€å§‹åˆ‡åˆ†å¯ä»¥å–å¾—å¾ˆå¥½çš„åˆ‡åˆ†æ•ˆæœåŠå¹³è¡¡æ€§ã€‚
                      ä¸­å€¼é€‰æ‹©ä¼˜åŒ–(a)- ç®—æ³•å¼€å§‹å‰ï¼Œå¯¹åŸå§‹æ•°æ®ç‚¹åœ¨æ‰€æœ‰ç»´åº¦è¿›è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡æ’åºï¼Œå­˜å‚¨ä¸‹æ¥ã€‚ - åœ¨åç»­çš„ä¸­å€¼é€‰æ‹©ä¸­ï¼Œæ— é¡»æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½å¯¹å…¶å­é›†è¿›è¡Œæ’åºï¼Œæå‡äº†æ€§èƒ½ã€‚
                      ä¸­å€¼é€‰æ‹©ä¼˜åŒ–(b)- ä»åŸå§‹æ•°æ®ç‚¹ä¸­éšæœºé€‰æ‹©å›ºå®šæ•°ç›®çš„ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹å…¶è¿›è¡Œæ’åºã€‚ - æ¯æ¬¡ä»è¿™äº›æ ·æœ¬ç‚¹ä¸­å–ä¸­å€¼ï¼Œæ¥ä½œä¸ºåˆ†å‰²è¶…å¹³é¢ã€‚ - è¯¥æ–¹å¼åœ¨å®è·µä¸­è¢«è¯æ˜å¯ä»¥å–å¾—å¾ˆå¥½æ€§èƒ½åŠå¾ˆå¥½çš„å¹³è¡¡æ€§ã€‚
                      • å–æ•°æ®ç‚¹åœ¨è¯¥ç»´åº¦çš„ä¸­å€¼ä½œä¸ºåˆ‡åˆ†è¶…å¹³é¢;
                      • å°†ä¸­å€¼å·¦ä¾§çš„æ•°æ®ç‚¹æŒ‚åœ¨å…¶å·¦å­æ ‘ï¼Œå°†ä¸­å€¼å³ä¾§çš„æ•°æ®ç‚¹æŒ‚åœ¨å…¶å³å­æ ‘;
                      • é€’å½’å¤„ç†å…¶å­æ ‘ï¼Œç›´è‡³æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®ç‚¹æŒ‚è½½å®Œæ¯•ã€‚
                      template<class T>
void KDTree<T>::BuildKDTree(vector<vector<T>> points, Node<T>* root)
{
    int indexpart = 0, max = 0;
    vector<T> temp;
    for (st i = 0; i < _k; i++)
    {
        temp.clear();
        for each (auto var in points)
        {
            temp.push_back(var[i]);
        }

        double ave = accumulate(temp.begin(), temp.end(), 0.0) / _point_num; // å¹³å‡å€¼
        double accum = 0.0;


        for each (auto var in temp)
        {
            accum += (var - ave) * (var - ave); //todo:æ–¹å·®
        }

        if (accum > max)
        {
            max = int(accum);
            indexpart = int(i);
        }
    }

    //æ­¤æ—¶indexpartä¸ºè¦è¿›è¡Œçš„åˆ†è£‚ç»´æ•°
    temp.clear();
    for each (auto var in points)
    {
        temp.push_back(var[indexpart]);
    }

    //æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸­å€¼;
    sort(temp.begin(), temp.end());
    double median = temp[(temp.size()) >> 1];

    //å°†ç‚¹åˆ†ä¸ºå·¦å³ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ† 
    vector<vector<T>> leftpoints, rightpoints;
    for each(auto var in points)
    {
        if (var[indexpart] < median)
        {
            leftpoints.push_back(var);
        }

        if (var[indexpart] == median)
        {
            root->m_split = indexpart + 1;
            root->m_point = var;
        }

        if (var[indexpart] > median)
        {
            rightpoints.push_back(var);
        }
    }

    //é€’å½’
    if (leftpoints.size() == 0 && rightpoints.size() == 0)
    {
        root->is_leaf = true;
    }
    if (leftpoints.size() != 0)
    {
        root->lc = new Node<T>();
        root->lc->parent = root;
        BuildKDTree(leftpoints, root->lc);
    }
    if (rightpoints.size() != 0)
    {
        root->rc = new Node<T>();
        root->rc->parent = root;
        BuildKDTree(rightpoints, root->rc);
    }
}
                      # 2. èŒƒå›´æŸ¥è¯¢
                      • å¯¹äºä»»ä¸€çŸ©å½¢æŸ¥è¯¢åŒºåŸŸRï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å‡ºå‘ï¼ŒæŒ‰å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼é€’å½’ï¼š

                      1) åœ¨ä»»æ„èŠ‚ç‚¹vå¤„ï¼Œè‹¥å­æ ‘vä»…å«å•ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ™æ„å‘³ç€çŸ©é˜µåŒºåŸŸvä¸­ä»…è¦†ç›–å•ä¸ªè¾“å…¥ç‚¹ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å¯ç›´æ¥åˆ¤æ–­è¯¥ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦è½åœ¨Rå†…ã€‚
                      2) å¦åˆ™ï¼Œåˆ™å‡å®šçŸ©å½¢åŒºåŸŸvä¸­åŒ…å«å¤šä¸ªè¾“å…¥ç‚¹,è¿™æ—¶åˆ†ä¸ºä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µï¼š

                      • a) è‹¥çŸ©å½¢åŒºåŸŸvå®Œå…¨åŒ…å«äºRå†…ï¼Œåˆ™å…¶ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰çš„è¾“å…¥ç‚¹å‡è½åœ¨Rå†…ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦éå†å­æ ‘v,å³å¯æŠ¥å‘Šè¿™éƒ¨åˆ†è¾“å…¥ç‚¹ã€‚
                      • **b)**è‹¥äºŒè€…ç›¸äº¤ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰å¿…è¦åˆ†åˆ«è¾“å…¥åˆ°vçš„å·¦ã€å³å­æ ‘ä¸­ï¼Œç»§ç»­é€’å½’æŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚
                      • **c)**è‹¥äºŒè€…å½¼æ­¤åˆ†ç¦»ï¼Œåˆ™å­é›†vä¸­çš„ç‚¹ä¸å¯èƒ½è½åœ¨Rå†…ï¼Œé€’å½’åˆ†æ”¯ç»ˆæ­¢ã€‚
                      template<class T>
void KDTree<T>::SearchRecu(vector<T> from, vector<T> to, const Node<T>* temp, vector <vector<T>>& nodes)const
{
    if (temp == nullptr)return; // å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç©ºæ ‘
    
    int partindex = temp->m_split - 1; // å½“å‰ç»´åº¦
    int value = temp->m_point[partindex];
    if (from[partindex] <= value && to[partindex] >= value) //ç‚¹åœ¨èŒƒå›´å†…
    {
        bool in_region = true;
        for (st i = 0; i < _k; i++)
        {
            if (from[i] > temp->m_point[i] || to[i] < temp->m_point[i])
            {
                in_region = false;
            }
        }
        if (in_region)
        {
            nodes.push_back(temp->m_point);
        }
        SearchRecu(from, to, temp->lc, nodes);
        SearchRecu(from, to, temp->rc, nodes);
    }
    else if (value > to[partindex])
    {
        SearchRecu(from, to, temp->lc, nodes);
    }
    else if (value < from[partindex])
    {
        SearchRecu(from, to, temp->rc, nodes);
    }
}

                      # ä¸‰. å®ç°KDæ ‘

                      # 1. èŠ‚ç‚¹ç»“æ„
                      template <class T>
struct Node
{
    bool is_leaf;
    vector<T> m_point; //kç»´çš„ç‚¹
    int m_split; //è¢«åˆ†å¼€çš„ç»´åº¦
    Node* parent;
    Node* lc;
    Node* rc;
};
                      # 2. æ ‘ç»“æ„
                      template<class T>
class KDTree
{
public:
    KDTree(int k,vector<vector<T>> allpoints); //æ„é€ å‡½æ•°
    ~KDTree() {};   //ææ„å‡½æ•°
    void Insert(vector<T> newpoint); //æ’å…¥ç»“ç‚¹
    vector<vector<T>> SearchByRegion(vector<T> from, vector<T> to)const; // æŸ¥æ‰¾åŒºåŸŸ
    vector<T> SearchNearestNode(vector<T> goalpoint); //æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¦»ç›®æ ‡æœ€è¿‘çš„ç»“ç‚¹
private:
    void BuildKDTree(vector<vector<T>> points, Node<T>* root); //åˆ›é€ æ ‘
    void SearchNearestByTree(vector<T> goalpoint, T& curdis, const Node<T>* treeroot, vector<T>& nearestpoint); //å¯»æ‰¾ä¸ç›®æ ‡ç‚¹æœ€è¿‘çš„ç‚¹
    void SearchRecu(vector<T> from, vector<T> to, const Node<T>* temp, vector < vector<T>>& nodes)const; //æŸ¥æ‰¾åŒºåŸŸå†…çš„ç‚¹
    T CalDistance(vector<T> point1, vector<double> point2); //è®¡ç®—è·ç¦»
private:
    Node<T>* _root; //æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹
    int _k; //ç»´åº¦
    int _point_num; //ç‚¹çš„æ•°é‡
    vector<vector<T>> points; //ç‚¹çš„é›†åˆ
};
                      # 3. æ–¹æ³•å®ç°
                      template<class T>
//æ„é€ å‡½æ•°
KDTree<T>::KDTree(int k, vector<vector<T>> allpoints) :_k(k)
{
    _root = new Node<T>();
    _root->is_leaf = false;
    _root->lc = nullptr;
    _root->rc = nullptr;

    _point_num = int(allpoints.size());
    points = allpoints;
    BuildKDTree(allpoints, _root);
}

template<class T>
//åˆ›é€ æ ‘
void KDTree<T>::BuildKDTree(vector<vector<T>> points, Node<T>* root)
{
    int indexpart = 0, max = 0;
    vector<T> temp;
    for (st i = 0; i < _k; i++)
    {
        temp.clear();
        for each (auto var in points)
        {
            temp.push_back(var[i]);
        }

        double ave = accumulate(temp.begin(), temp.end(), 0.0) / _point_num; // å¹³å‡å€¼
        double accum = 0.0;


        for each (auto var in temp)
        {
            accum += (var - ave) * (var - ave); //todo:æ–¹å·®
        }

        if (accum > max)
        {
            max = int(accum);
            indexpart = int(i);
        }
    }

    //æ­¤æ—¶indexpartä¸ºè¦è¿›è¡Œçš„åˆ†è£‚ç»´æ•°
    temp.clear();
    for each (auto var in points)
    {
        temp.push_back(var[indexpart]);
    }

    //æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸­å€¼;
    sort(temp.begin(), temp.end());
    double median = temp[(temp.size()) >> 1];

    //å°†ç‚¹åˆ†ä¸ºå·¦å³ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ† 
    vector<vector<T>> leftpoints, rightpoints;
    for each(auto var in points)
    {
        if (var[indexpart] < median)
        {
            leftpoints.push_back(var);
        }

        if (var[indexpart] == median)
        {
            root->m_split = indexpart + 1;
            root->m_point = var;
        }

        if (var[indexpart] > median)
        {
            rightpoints.push_back(var);
        }
    }

    //é€’å½’
    if (leftpoints.size() == 0 && rightpoints.size() == 0)
    {
        root->is_leaf = true;
    }
    if (leftpoints.size() != 0)
    {
        root->lc = new Node<T>();
        root->lc->parent = root;
        BuildKDTree(leftpoints, root->lc);
    }
    if (rightpoints.size() != 0)
    {
        root->rc = new Node<T>();
        root->rc->parent = root;
        BuildKDTree(rightpoints, root->rc);
    }
}

template<class T>
//å¯»æ‰¾ä¸ç›®æ ‡ç‚¹æœ€è¿‘çš„ç‚¹
void KDTree<T>::SearchNearestByTree(vector<T> goalpoint, T& curdis, const Node<T>* treeroot, vector<T>& nearestpoint)
{
    if (treeroot == nullptr)return; // å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç©ºæ ‘
    double newdis = CalDistance(goalpoint, treeroot->m_point); // è®¡ç®—è·ç¦»
    if (newdis < curdis)
    {
        curdis = newdis;
        nearestpoint = treeroot->m_point;
    }
    SearchNearestByTree(goalpoint, curdis, treeroot->lc, nearestpoint);
    SearchNearestByTree(goalpoint, curdis, treeroot->rc, nearestpoint);
}

template<class T>
//æŸ¥æ‰¾åŒºåŸŸå†…çš„ç‚¹
void KDTree<T>::SearchRecu(vector<T> from, vector<T> to, const Node<T>* temp, vector <vector<T>>& nodes)const
{
    if (temp == nullptr)return; // å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç©ºæ ‘
    
    int partindex = temp->m_split - 1; // å½“å‰ç»´åº¦
    int value = temp->m_point[partindex];
    if (from[partindex] <= value && to[partindex] >= value) //ç‚¹åœ¨èŒƒå›´å†…
    {
        bool in_region = true;
        for (st i = 0; i < _k; i++)
        {
            if (from[i] > temp->m_point[i] || to[i] < temp->m_point[i])
            {
                in_region = false;
            }
        }
        if (in_region)
        {
            nodes.push_back(temp->m_point);
        }
        SearchRecu(from, to, temp->lc, nodes);
        SearchRecu(from, to, temp->rc, nodes);
    }
    else if (value > to[partindex])
    {
        SearchRecu(from, to, temp->lc, nodes);
    }
    else if (value < from[partindex])
    {
        SearchRecu(from, to, temp->rc, nodes);
    }
}

template<class T>
//è®¡ç®—è·ç¦»
T KDTree<T>::CalDistance(vector<T> point1, vector<double> point2)
{
    if (point1.size() != point2.size())
    {
        cerr << "ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹ç»´åº¦ä¸åŒ";
        exit(1);
    }
    double distance = 0.0;
    for (st i = 0; i < point1.size(); i++)
    {
        distance += pow((point1[i] - point2[i]), 2);
    }
    return sqrt(distance);
}

template<class T>
//æ’å…¥ç»“ç‚¹
void KDTree<T>::Insert(vector<T> newpoint)
{
    if (newpoint.size() != _k)
    {
        cerr << "æ’å…¥ç‚¹ç»´æ•°ä¸KDæ ‘ä¸åŒ¹é…" << endl;
    }

    Node<T>* temp = _root;
    if (temp == nullptr) //è‹¥ä¸ºç©ºæ ‘
    {
        temp = new Node<T>();
        temp->is_leaf = true;
        temp->m_split = 1;
        temp->m_point = newpoint;
        return;
    }

    if (temp->is_leaf) //è‹¥æ ‘åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ’å…¥å‡†å¤‡
    {
        temp->is_leaf = false;
        int max = 0, partindex = 0;
        for (st i = 0; i < _k; i++)
        {
            double delta = abs(newpoint[i] - temp->m_point[i]);
            if (delta > max)
            {
                max = delta;
                temp->m_split = i + 1;
            }
        }
    }
    while (true)
    {
        int partindex = temp->m_split - 1;
        Node<T>* nextnode;
        if (newpoint[partindex] > temp->m_point[partindex])
        {
            if (temp->rc == nullptr) //å³å­æ ‘æ’å…¥ç‚¹
            {
                temp->rc = new Node<T>();
                temp->rc->parent = temp;
                temp->rc->is_leaf = true;
                temp->rc->m_split = 1;
                temp->rc->m_point = newpoint;
                break;
            }
            else nextnode = temp->rc;
        }
        else
        {
            if (temp->lc == nullptr) //å·¦å­æ ‘æ’å…¥
            {
                temp->lc = new Node<T>();
                temp->lc->parent = temp;
                temp->lc->is_leaf = true;
                temp->lc->m_split = 1;
                temp->lc->m_point = newpoint;
                break;
            }
            else nextnode = temp->lc;
        }

        if (nextnode->is_leaf) //å¦‚æœæ˜¯å¶ç»“ç‚¹ï¼Œæ’å…¥å‡†å¤‡
        {
            nextnode->is_leaf = false;
            int max = 0; partindex = 0;
            for (st i = 0; i < _k; i++)
            {
                double delta = abs(newpoint[i] - nextnode->m_point[i]);
                if (delta > max)
                {
                    max = delta;
                    nextnode->m_split = i + 1;
                }
            }
        }
        temp = nextnode; // ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥
    }
}

template<class T>
// æŸ¥æ‰¾åŒºåŸŸ
vector<vector<T>> KDTree<T>::SearchByRegion(vector<T> from, vector<T> to)const
{
    vector<vector<T>> result;
    if (from.size() != _k || to.size() != _k)
    {
        cerr << "æœç´¢åŒºåŸŸç»´æ•°ä¸KDæ ‘ä¸åŒ¹é…" << endl;
        exit(1);
    }
    for (st i = 0; i < _k; i++)
    {
        if (from[i] > to[i])
        {
            cerr << "åŒºåŸŸèµ·å§‹ç‚¹åæ ‡å¤§äºåŒºåŸŸç»ˆç‚¹" << endl;
            exit(1);
        }
    }
    SearchRecu(from, to, _root, result);
    return result;
}

template<class T>
// æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¦»ç›®æ ‡æœ€è¿‘çš„ç»“ç‚¹ 
vector<T> KDTree<T>::SearchNearestNode(vector<T> goalpoint)
{
    vector<T> nearest_point;
    Node* temp = _root;
    while (!temp->is_leaf) //æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€é è¿‘çš„å¶ç»“ç‚¹
    {
        int partindex = temp->m_split - 1;
        if (temp->lc != nullptr && goalpoint[partindex] < temp->m_point[partindex])
        {
            temp = temp->lc;
        }
        else if (temp->rc)
        {
            temp = temp->rc;
        }
    }
    nearest_point = temp->m_point;
    double curdis = CalDistance(goalpoint, nearest_point);

    bool is_left = false;
    while (temp != _root) //å›æº¯
    {
        is_left = (temp == temp->parent->lc); //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹
        temp = temp->parent; // æŒ‡é’ˆä¸Šç§»
        if (CalDistance(goalpoint, temp->m_point) < curdis)
        {
            nearest_point = temp->m_point;
            curdis = CalDistance(goalpoint, nearest_point);
        }
        int partindex = temp->m_split - 1;

        // åˆ¤æ–­å¦ä¸€è¾¹å­æ ‘æœ‰æ²¡æœ‰æ›´è¿‘çš„ç‚¹
        if (curdis > abs(temp->m_point[partindex] - goalpoint[partindex]))
        {
            if (is_left)
            {
                SearchNearestByTree(goalpoint, curdis, temp->rc, nearest_point);
            }
            else {
                SearchNearestByTree(goalpoint, curdis, temp->lc, nearest_point);
            }
        }
    }
    return nearest_point;
}
